title: Projects
description: A collection of my work and project.

projects.title: Linux From Scratch (LFS) Virtual Appliance
projects.description: A custom Linux distribution built from scratch following the LFS documentation, packaged as a VirtualBox Open Virtualization Format (OVA) for easy deployment and testing.

projects.title: IContract (Contract Management System)
projects.description: An integrated contract management system designed to streamline the creation, tracking, and management of contracts within an organization.

projects.title: ATS CV Analyzer
projects.description: An Applicant Tracking System (ATS) that utilizes string matching algorithms (KMP, BM, Aho-Corasick) and fuzzy matching to efficiently analyze and filter CVs.

projects.title: Little Alchemy 2 Recipe Finder (Backend)
projects.description: A backend service that implements BFS, DFS, and Bidirectional Search algorithms to find element recipes and generation trees for the game Little Alchemy 2.

projects.title: Little Alchemy 2 Recipe Finder (Frontend)
projects.description: The frontend interface for the Little Alchemy 2 recipe finder, featuring interactive tree visualizations of element combinations using graph-based search results.

projects.title: Better Call Pascal (Pascal-S Compiler)
projects.description: A simple compiler for the Pascal-S programming language, featuring a lexer, parser, and semantic analyzer, developed as part of the Formal Language and Automata Theory course.

projects.title: Quadtree Image Compressor & GIF Generator
projects.description: An image compression tool that uses the Divide and Conquer algorithm (Quadtree) to compress images and generate step-by-step GIF visualizations using various metrics like Variance, SSIM, and Entropy.

projects.title: AI Course Scheduler
projects.description: An automated course scheduling application that utilizes local search algorithms to optimize class timings and room assignments based on specific constraints.

projects.title: Rush Hour Puzzle Solver
projects.description: A web-based puzzle solver for the game 'Rush Hour' that implements various pathfinding and heuristic algorithms like A*, GBFS, UCS, and Simulated Annealing to find optimal solutions.

projects.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Card Collection Manager
projects.description: A card management system for Yu-Gi-Oh! enthusiasts that allows users to search, collect, and manage their card decks through an interactive interface.
